Text: it seems like you have not seen my request and uploads this movie with low bit rate while there are plenty files available on net similar of this size...you don't know to whom you catering this movie while there is huge demand of slightly bigger size of this this flick(not big as scene release perhaps slightly better bit rate would do)...wish you could understand the demand...
